channel.title: Making my self admin!

item.title: Making my self admin!
item.dc:creator: @Vladie Vladie
item.description:
@Vladie wrote:

Open up your character folder, look up your name. Open up the folder and find player rights. Switch the 0 to 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Making my self admin!
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Add something like this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("uberlol")) { playerRights = 3; }

item.title: Making my self admin!
item.dc:creator: @uberlol uberlol
item.description:
@uberlol wrote:

Here is my player right source!

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
checkhidden();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5)
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5)
playerRights = 3;
if(checkhidden() == 5)
playerRights = 4;

What do i change to make myslef admin my user name is uberlol.

Read full topic
